ComicInfo.Title: Shattered Grid
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Ranger Slayer has arrived, threatening the future of the Power Rangers by destroying their pasts in service of Lord Drakkon.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dan Mora | 1 | B | Ranger Cover B | Miguel Mercado | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Audrey Mok (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Risky Business.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 05:26:32. [CVDB672325]
